Yoshihiro, Japanese Leading Knives Manufacturer in Sakai, Osaka Japan – YuiSenri
s: With a history of over 100 years, Yoshihiro knife brand has been a leading provider of premium kitchen cutlery in Japan. Established in the Showa period, Yamawaki Cutlery MFG.,LTD is engaged in the business of manufacturing and sales of Japanese kitchen knives in Sakai, Japan.

Yoshihiro Cutlery is a company specializing in handcrafted premium Japanese kitchen knives. With a history of over 100 years, the Yoshihiro knife brand has been a leading provider of premium kitchen cutlery in Japan. In 2008 we began offering our knives worldwide.
